name: Aldori Artistry
text: You can do more with your blade than slash and stab.
prerequisites: Exotic Weapon Proficiency (Aldori dueling sword), Weapon Finesse, base attack bonus +2.
benefit: Choose one of the following combat maneuvers: disarm, reposition<sup>APG</sup>, steal<sup>APG</sup>, sunder, or trip. You gain a +2 bonus when performing the selected maneuver while wielding an Aldori dueling sword. This bonus does not stack with the bonus provided by a combat maneuver feat with “improved” in its name (such as Improved Trip).
special: You can select this feat multiple times, choosing a different combat maneuver each time.
